Articles.Content:
Brett Kerman: The prototype has been stolen!

Gene Kerman: Stop those pilots!

Brett Kerman: I'm deactivating the engines.

...retrieving footage...

Cecil Kerman: Sir, they've landed in the golf course.

Brett Kerman: Send some guys over there and take the plane back!

...10 minutes later...

Cecil Kerman: Okay, Sidtrey is flying the L-3 back to the runway.

...5 minutes later...

Sidtrey Kerman: Prototype retrieved! The Swallow is safe.

Gene Kerman: Bill and Bob, you guys are on suspension...and no snacks!

June 30th, 2013:

Two pilots stole the L-3 Swallow prototype to pick up some snacks at K-Mart. The plane was retrieved safely and the pilots punished.

BluPlanet Incorporated releases the L-3 Swallow (made by me surprisingly), a three-seater medium range aircraft. For some reason it appears to be stable and actually flies quite well. Something must be broken here... Anyways, it takes off quick and has a bunch of radial intakes because reasons.

Be the first to buy this craft! https://www.dropbox.com/s/05qkrmatofkrxl6/L-3%20Swallow.craft
